Package bcu.cmp5332.librarysystem.model

Class Book

java.lang.Object
bcu.cmp5332.librarysystem.model.Book
public class Book extends Object
Book class models a book in the library. The book has fields for different book properties such as title and author and also has an id field that represents the book's unique id in the library system. In addition, the class has a loan field of type Loan that holds information about a book that is on loan. The class also offers getter and setter methods to get and set the values of the different properties and methods that change the status of the book when it gets borrowed or returned to the library.

  • Constructor Details

    • Book

      public Book(int id, String title, String author, String publicationYear, String publisher)
      The constructor initialises a Book object using the basic mandatory fields a book should have to exist in the library. Additional fields can be set after initialisation using the class's setter methods
      Parameters:
      id - the book's id.
      title - the book's title.
      author - the book' author.
      publicationYear - the book's publication year.
      publisher - the book's publisher.

    • getDueDate

      public LocalDate getDueDate()
      Get the due date of a book that is on loan.
      Returns:
      the due date of a book if the book is on loan.

    • setDueDate

      public void setDueDate(LocalDate dueDate) throws LibraryException
      Set the due date of a book.
      The function sets (changes) the due date of a book that is currently on loan. If the book is not on loan, an exception should be thrown, notifying the user that the due date can't be set because the book is not on loan.
      Parameters:
      dueDate - the LocalDate value that will be set as the book's due date
      Throws:
      LibraryException - if the book is not on loan.

    • getDetailsShort

      public String getDetailsShort()
      Get short description for the book.
      Returns:
      the book's short description as a string.

    • getDetailsLong

      public String getDetailsLong()
      Get a long and detailed description for the book. The method prints the book id, author, publisher, publication year, and a list of all the books currently borrowed by the user.
      Returns:
      the book's long description as a string.

    • getStatus

      public String getStatus()
      Get the book's status. The function returns "On loan" if the book is on loan and "Available" if the book is available.
      Returns:
      the book status as String.

    • isOnLoan

      public boolean isOnLoan()
      Check if the book is on loan. The function checks if the book has a Loan associated with it and returns the results.
      Returns:
      true if the book is on loan and false if the book is available

    • returnToLibrary

      public void returnToLibrary()
      Return the book to the library This function is used to unset any loan information that exists for the book.

    • removeBook

      public void removeBook()
      Remove the book from the library. This function is used to change the isHidden value to true, when deleting the book from the library.

    • reAddBook

      public void reAddBook()
      Undo the 'remove from library' process. This function is used when the book could not be successfully removed from the library. As a result, the changes need to be undone.

    • isRemoved

      public boolean isRemoved()
      Checks the hidden status of the book.
      Returns:
      returns true if the book is supposed to be hidden and is not accessible

      public String toString()
